PT y Verde se quieren dar un regalazo de mil mdp con reforma que reduce dinero a partidos: Figueroa | Entérate
 by Redacción AN / JM



El ex consejero electoral del INE, Alfredo Figueroa, señaló que a la par de la discusión para aprobar una reforma electoral que reduzca el financiamiento a los partidos en un 50%, el PT y el Partido Verde impulsan “un regalazo” de mil mdp, ya que a cambio de sus votos a favor de la reforma solicitaron que se cancele el 50% de las multas que adeudan los partidos
text:
PT and Verde want to give a thousand-dollar gift with reform that reduces money to parties: Figueroa | Find out
 by AN / JM Writing



The former electoral advisor of the INE, Alfredo Figueroa, said that along with the discussion to approve an electoral reform that reduces funding to the parties by 50%, the PT and the Green Party promote “a gift” of a thousand million pesos, since in exchange for their votes in favor of the reform they requested that 50% of the fines owed by the parties be canceled
